overview:
Atenea tech develops and manages software projects. We are specialized in Drupal CMS and enterprise website development.

One of the most important experiences of Luis Ortiz was the creation of one of the first accessible website in the public administration for the Lâ€™Hospitalet de Llobregat city council. Siddharta Navarro has an international experience as business process developer in a telecommunication company in Paris.

We realized some projects with Drupal, including the â€œSant Climent de Llobregatâ€ city council website (http://santclimentdellobregat.cat), and the realization of consultancy projects for the â€œFundacio CIM UPCâ€, â€œEscoles Garbiâ€, â€œUOC Universitat Oberta de Catalunyaâ€, etc.

In addition, we are member of the Drupal Association and we are an active member in the Drupal Community in Barcelona.

If you want to know more about us you can visit our website (http://ateneatech.com), for the moment only available in Spanish and Catalan.
